    A factory for creating actions.
    Action CarniHungerBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    Checks all exits whether there is food and eat it immediately if so, Otherwise scan through entire map and find the closest food source and start moving towards it.

    Goes through each radius to check for suitable breeding partner, then do action if found

    Action GoToTallGrowableBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    Scans the entire map to find the closest Tall Growable to go to, if actor is on land
    Action HerbHungerBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    Checks all exits whether there is food and eat it immediately if so, Otherwise scan through entire map and find the closest food source and start moving towards it.
    Action LandBreedBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    Goes through each radius to check for suitable breeding partner, then do action if found
    Action PredatorBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)

    Action SmallBeakFeedingBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)

    A factory for creating actions.
    Action WanderBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    Returns a MoveAction to wander to a random location, if possible.
